name: Lich Beastmaster
description:
Use cursor keys and mouse.

Click on the animals to exert your will, but conserve your power until you grow stronger.

  • F full screen
  • R restart
  • H hard mode (then R restart)
  • S sheep mode (then R restart)

Touch input coming soon.
